summary: Oil and natural gas wells on federal land bring in billions in federal revenue. However, if their operators don’t properly manage these wells, the government may end up paying to clean them up when they stop producing. And the bonds operators provide as insurance are often not enough to cover the costs of this cleanup. We found that the Bureau of Land Management identified 89...
title: Oil and Gas: Bureau of Land Management Should Address Risks from Insufficient Bonds to Reclaim Wells
